title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 8 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 8 2022
description:
DeSantis defends his Parental Rights in Education Bill, which libs are mocking as "Don't Say Gay" bill. Clay reminds us that parents can take charge and talk to their kids about whatever they want to at home. NYC Mayor Adams still mandating masks for kids under five years old. Steven W. Mosher, President of the Population Research Institute and author of a dozen books on China, joins C&B to discuss what China's Chairman Xi is learning from Putin's invasion of Ukraine. His overall ominous summation: "Putin wants to be the reincarnation of Peter the Great… But Xi Jinping, like Chinese emperors past, is pursuing a much more grandiose vision. He wants to rule over all under heaven." C&B take calls.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
